actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The gnoll attacks three times with its Charging Claw.

actions.name: Charging Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage  or 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage if this is the gnolls first attack on this target this turn. The gnoll may then move up to 10 feet without provoking opportunity attacks.

special_abilities.name: Aligned
special_abilities.desc: The gnoll radiates a Chaotic and Evil aura.

special_abilities.name: Possessed
special_abilities.desc: If the gnoll demonfang is turned or affected by dispel evil and good or a similar effect, it transforms into an ordinary gnoll. Any damage it has taken carries over to its new form. If this damage exceeds its maximum hit points, it dies.
